enchantment.incombustium.incombustible.d: Makes the item resistant to all but the void.
enchantment.incombustium.spectral.desc: Makes the item glow whilst on the ground.
enchantment.incombustium.everlasting.des: Makes the item take longer to despawn.
enchantment.incombustium.time.desc: Makes the item despawn much faster.
enchantment.incombustium.gravitation.des: Makes the item float when dropped.
enchantment.incombustium.clumsy.desc: When hit, there is a chance you drop this item.
